alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 2:37AM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Midnight MDT Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Recreation in the high country could be impacted by heavy accumulating snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
